participant_1.background:
I think my family would be disappointed, but they would still love me.
I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
i never knew my dad.
My favorite book is The Little Prince because it reminds me of my dog.
i am a rapper.

participant_2.background:
I once pretended to be a tour guide to escape a speeding ticket.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar, write music, and sing. I also enjoy spending time with friends and family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. What kind of music do you like to write?
I like to write pop music. I think it's a fun and upbeat genre.
Me too. I love to sing and dance to pop music.
I love to dance as well. It's a great way to express yourself.
It sure is. I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too. What else do you like to do for fun?
I also enjoy reading, writing, and spending time with my family and friends.
Those are all great hobbies. I like to read as well.
My favorite book is The Little Prince.
That's a great book. I love the illustrations.
I'm glad we have something in common.
